example_sentence_english: The tip is in the wallet.

example_sentence_english: I gave some tips to the waiters.

example_sentence_italian: Il valore della mancia è basso.
example_sentence_english: The amount of the tip is low.

example_sentence_english: I did not think to add anything to the tip.

example_sentence_english: The expenses were taken from the tips.

example_sentence_english: Is the tax included in the tip?

example_sentence_italian: Ho letto errori nelle mance registrate.
example_sentence_english: I read errors in the recorded tips.
